sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-container class="main-container">
    <el-header class="main-container">
      <el-menu
        :default-active="activeIndex"
        class="el-menu-demo"
        mode="horizontal"
        background-color="#545c64"
        text-color="#fff"
        active-text-color="#ffd04b"
        color="accent"
        @select="(e) => handleSelect(e)"
      >
        <el-menu-item index="1">Home</el-menu-item>
        <el-menu-item index="2"
          >Countries</el-menu-item
        >
        <el-menu-item index="3"
          >Log In</el-menu-item
        >
      </el-menu>
    </el-header>
    <el-container>
      <el-main>
        <router-view @activeItem='updateActive'/>
      </el-main>
    </el-container>
  </el-container>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from "vue";
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {   },
  setup() {
    const router = useRouter();
    const appRoutes = Array.from(router.getRoutes());
    var activeIndex = ref('1');

    const updateActive = (index) => {
      activeIndex.value = index;
    }

    const handleSelect = (index) => {
      router.push(appRoutes[index -1].path);
      updateActive(index);
    }

    return {
      appRoutes,
      activeIndex,
      updateActive,
      handleSelect
    };
  },

};
</script>

<style scoped>
.main-container {
  padding: 0px !important;
}
</style>
